item.title: Rainy Days
item.author: Author
item.description: Rain Rain Go Away It’s raining, it’s pouring, your day feels really boring—and you’re racking your brain for what to do on a rainy day. When the forecast is grim, whether it’s thunderstorms or a blizzard, cabin fever can set in fast. You can curl up with a great book or binge-watch an entire season of something, but, let’s face it, sometimes you want different, fun things to do at home.
